data.comment: The match has started at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Leverkusen's Nadiem Amiri is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 3, Freiburg take a 1-0 lead thanks to Lucas Holer.
Lukas Kubler instrumental with a fine assist.
Important block from the Freiburg defence as Leon Bailey fires in a strike for Leverkusen.
In the minute 5, Can Leverkusen capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Freiburg's half?
Leverkusen to take a throw-in in Freiburg territory.
Throw-in for Leverkusen close to the penalty box.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Freiburg in their own half.
Freiburg drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Benjamin Cortus signals a throw-in for Freiburg, close to Leverkusen's area.
In the minute 11, Benjamin Cortus awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Leverkusen in the half of Freiburg.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Leverkusen in their own half.
Leverkusen have a dangerous throw-in.
At Schwarzwald-Stadion, Leverkusen are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 19, Leverkusen push forward at Schwarzwald-Stadion and Nadiem Amiri gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Freiburg defence.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Leverkusen.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
Leverkusen will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Freiburg.
Sven Bender (Leverkusen) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 25, Freiburg's Vincenzo Grifo misses with an attempt on goal.
Leverkusen have a goal kick.
Freiburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Leverkusen goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Freiburg in Freiburg.
Freiburg are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 28, Leon Bailey of Leverkusen smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Moussa Diaby for Leverkusen gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Freiburg.
In the minute 29, Goal! Lucas Alario levels the match at 1-1.
Ball safe as Leverkusen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Leverkusen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Freiburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Freiburg's Vincenzo Grifo goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Cortus.
In the minute 34, In Freiburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
Leverkusen needs to be cautious. Freiburg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 39, Leverkusen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Freiburg.
Throw-in Leverkusen.
In the minute 41, Leverkusen push upfield but Benjamin Cortus quickly pulls them for offside.
Lucas Alario (Leverkusen) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Lucas Alario puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
In the minute 42, Lars Bender with an assist there.
In Freiburg, Daley Sinkgraven of Leverkusen is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Leverkusen just outside Freiburg's area.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 45, Leverkusen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 45, Lukas Kubler (Freiburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Benjamin Cortus awards the away team a throw-in.
In Freiburg Freiburg attack through Vincenzo Grifo. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 47, Benjamin Cortus awards Leverkusen a goal kick.
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
Ball safe as Leverkusen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, Free kick Freiburg.
In Freiburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Dominique Heintz (Freiburg) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 51, Benjamin Cortus signals a Leverkusen throw-in in Freiburg's half.
Throw-in for Freiburg in their own half.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Cortus.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Freiburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Freiburg are caught offside.
Benjamin Cortus awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 55, Throw-in Leverkusen.
Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Leverkusen.
Leverkusen pushes forward through Moussa Diaby, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 59, Baptiste Santamaria of Freiburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Leverkusen at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 60, Moussa Diaby is booked for the away team.
Leverkusen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Leverkusen.
In the minute 62, Leverkusen are whistled for offside.
Benjamin Cortus awards Freiburg a goal kick.
Ball safe as Freiburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 63, Christian Streich is making the team's first substitution at Schwarzwald-Stadion with Nils Petersen replacing Lukas Kubler.
It's now 1-3 in Freiburg as Nadiem Amiri scores for Leverkusen.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Cortus.
In the minute 65, Jonathan Tah is replacing Lars Bender for Leverkusen at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Free kick for Freiburg in the half of Leverkusen.
Leverkusen make their second substitution with Kerem Demirbay replacing Julian Baumgartlinger.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Leverkusen at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in their own half.
Goal kick for Freiburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
In the minute 70, Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Freiburg.
Corner awarded to Freiburg.
Goal! Freiburg reduce the deficit to 2-3 through Nils Petersen.
In the minute 72, Great play from Vincenzo Grifo to set up the goal.
Leverkusen are pushing forward but Leon Bailey's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
In the minute 75, Freiburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 76, Leverkusen's Kerem Demirbay gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Freiburg defender.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
Leverkusen move into a more comfortable 2-4 lead. Jonathan Tah is the scorer with a header!
That's a fine assist from Kerem Demirbay.
Can Freiburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leverkusen's half?
In the minute 78, Leverkusen have a goal kick.
Christian Streich is making the team's fourth substitution at Schwarzwald-Stadion with Woo-yeong Jeong replacing Vincenzo Grifo.
Christian Streich (Freiburg) is making a second substitution, with Ermedin Demirovic replacing Lucas Holer.
In the minute 79, The home team have replaced Roland Sallai with Chang-Hoon Kwon. This is the third substitution made today by Christian Streich.
The away team replace Moussa Diaby with Karim Bellarabi.
In Freiburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 82, In Freiburg, Leverkusen push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Freiburg drives forward and Nils Petersen gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Cortus.
In the minute 84, It's a goal kick for the home team in Freiburg.
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
Throw-in for Leverkusen in their own half.
In the minute 86, Free kick in a good position for Leverkusen!
Nadiem Amiri (Leverkusen) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Leverkusen have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Cortus.
In the minute 87, Leverkusen drive upfield and Leon Bailey gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Freiburg defender.
Freiburg drives forward and Baptiste Santamaria gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Exequiel Palacios is on a sub for Lucas Alario for Leverkusen.
Throw-in for Freiburg at Schwarzwald-Stadion.
At Schwarzwald-Stadion the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In Freiburg Leverkusen drive forward through Leon Bailey. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Leverkusen.
Throw-in Freiburg.
Free kick for Freiburg in the half of Leverkusen.
Ball goes out of play for a Leverkusen goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 2-4.
